content.raw: The ihmc code didn't seem to be working, so we haven't pushed that code to the apt repository. This pull request doesn't break anything, so it has been released. Currently, a static transform for the hokuyo link will be published alongside its true transform, which causes flickering in tf, but is not much worse than the previous behavior of just the static transform.
content.html: The ihmc code didn't seem to be working, so we haven't pushed that code to the apt repository. This pull request doesn't break anything, so it has been released. Currently, a static transform for the hokuyo link will be published alongside its true transform, which causes flickering in tf, but is not much worse than the previous behavior of just the static transform.
